scripts.prisma:generate: docker compose exec api npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker compose exec api npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.prisma:studio: docker compose exec api npx prisma studio
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: docker compose exec api npm run lint
scripts.lint:frontend: docker compose exec frontend npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.lint:fix:backend: docker compose exec api npm run lint:fix
scripts.lint:fix:frontend: docker compose exec frontend npm run lint:fix
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: docker compose exec api npm run format
scripts.format:frontend: docker compose exec frontend npm run format
